contentList.content: You know how to utilize a staff as an arcane firearm--a conduit for your destructive spells. While wielding a staff, you can add an extra 1d8 to damage rolls with your spells.
After you reach 5th level as a Cleric, creatures that fail their saving throw are additionally <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="BANISHED">Banished</LSTag> for the duration.
You have <LSTag Tooltip="ArmourProficiency">Armour Proficiency</LSTag> with Light and Medium Armour and Shields.
You may change your cantrip by selecting another one from the Wizard spell list below. This cantrip doesn't use <LSTag Tooltip="SpellSlot">spell slots</LSTag> and can be cast at will.
Protect a creature from attacks: increase its <LSTag Tooltip="ArmourClass">Armour Class</LSTag> up to [1].
